Hello there, fellow human being!

My name is Andrii Mishkovskyi and this nothing more than just a personal page. What you're probably more interested in is my blog, where you can see recent posts about Python, OpenStreetMap and (sometimes) Emacs.

If you think that you know me personally, you could probably add me on Facebook or Google+, whichever you prefer. If you think my messages limited by 140 characters in size might contain information interesting enough for you to read, then feel free to follow me on Twitter. I'm registered at a fair amount of other services, most often under nickname mishok13 or sometimes gdmfsob. I've even created a page with an extensive (though probably not complete) list of my profile pages on the internet. The list also includes my usernames in different messaging systems.

Some people prefer the good-old email. The address is contact@mishkovskyi.net.

If you feel like reading my resume, please follow this link.
